data.name: Music Maker 2022 Premium Steam Edition
data.detailed_description:
Music made easy



Bring your music to the next level with the high-quality sounds and effects in Music Maker Premium Edition.Choose from thousands of sounds, loops and instruments to build completely new songs again and again.Easily produce fresh and snappy beats in just a few clicks using the brand-new Beatbox Pro. And arranging musical ideas and complete songs is child's play using Song Maker AI. Produce music like the pros in no time!

Music Maker 2022 Premium Steam Edition

  • New! Beatbox Pro – the intuitive drum machine
  • New! Improved interface & design
  • New! Song Maker AI – The tool of the future

  • 3 Soundpools and 1 Soundpool Collection free
  • 3 MAGIX instruments and 2 Tiny instruments free
  • Even more Soundpools, instruments & functions: The in-app Music Maker Store
  • Stay up-to-date: A lifetime of free updates
  • Multicore audio engine
  • VST2 & VST3 support
  • Songparts
  • coreFX VolumeFormer
  • VST Bridge Orange Vocoder ME!

data.short_description: More beats, more power and more fun: Music Maker 2022 Premium Steam Edition
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Finnish, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese, Swedish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 | 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Graphics: Onboard, minimum resolution 1280 x 768
  • Sound Card: Internal sound card

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Music Maker 2022 Premium Steam Edition
